item.title: Diversity-Driven Synthesis: Enhancing Dataset Distillation through Directed Weight Adjustment
item.description: Boosting dataset distillation, a new method, Diversity-Driven Synthesis, uses directed weight adjustment to create diverse, representative synthetic datasets, improving model performance while reducin…
